name: IT Help Desk Template
description: Complete IT support ticketing system with ticket submission, search & management, conditional fields, priority-based routing, automated notifications, and Slack escalation for critical tickets
author: NetPad Examples

instructions.import: Import this template into NetPad to create a complete IT help desk system. Includes a ticket submission form, a ticket search/management form, and an automated routing workflow.
setup: 1. Import the template bundle using the NetPad import API or UI
2. Configure your MongoDB connection (the form will store submissions in your specified collection)
3. Customize department options, issue categories, and contact preferences to match your organization
4. Configure the workflow email addresses (change 'it-support@yourcompany.com' to your IT team's email)
5. Set up Slack integration and update the '#it-critical-alerts' channel name
6. Link the workflow to your form via the Workflows panel
7. Publish both the submission form (for end users) and search form (for IT staff)
8. Activate the workflow to enable automated routing
customization: Modify the department dropdown options to match your organization structure
Add or remove issue categories and their corresponding conditional fields
Customize urgency levels and response time expectations
Edit email templates in the workflow to match your organization's tone
Add additional workflow actions (e.g., create tickets in Jira, log to spreadsheet)
Configure form theme and branding to match your brand
Customize search form filters and result columns for your IT team's needs
